value.title: Driverless cars: Experts warn no easy answer to how safe they should be
value.excerpt: There is no easy answer as to how safe self-driving cars should be, an adviser to a new government-backed report has told the BBC. The Centre for Data Ethics and Innovation (CDEI) report warns that it might not be enough for self-driving cars to be safer than human drivers.
